synopsis.text:
Yama-chan, Ami-chan, and Hiyori Iki are eager to embark on their high school journey, but their first day takes an unexpected turn when the mischievous deity Yato decides to possess Hiyori's body. As Hiyori's spirit watches in horror, Yato uses her body to promote his services, causing a series of embarrassing and peculiar events. Meanwhile, Hiyori struggles to regain control of her body, leading to a chaotic and unforgettable start to her high school life.

On a beautiful day, Hiyori organizes a cherry blossom viewing party, inviting friends and even the formidable combat god, Bishamon. However, the peaceful gathering takes a turn when Yato and Bishamon, old rivals, start drinking together.

Based on the 25th chapter of the manga and the popular cherry blossom-viewing arc, this anime adaptation promises a blend of humor, supernatural elements, and a unique take on high school life. Will Hiyori manage to navigate through these extraordinary circumstances, or will Yato's antics continue to disrupt her life? Join Hiyori, Yato, and their friends in this thrilling and comedic adventure.
